name: MIGNYAN MEETUP
description:
Meat Meet up with some old friends in this little adventure! Who knows who where you might end up. :)

Mignyan Meetup is a short friendship simulator visual novel brought to you by the owners and moderators of PLANET MIGNYAN!
On your day off, one you planned on just sleeping away like any other, two friends reach out for your company - who do you humor, and where does your company lead? And why do they both seem so... different? It's up to you to find out!

...That is, if you really care enough. Maybe they're just having an off day...
